oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tastversuch zur Kompensation negativer Ertragsreaktionen nach Strohdüngung im (viehlosen) Getreideanbau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kolbe, Hartmut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Crop combinations and interactions
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: After straw application unfavourable yield effects are also known from (stockless) organic farming systems (BECKMANN et al. 2002). Therefore, different methods of straw application (without, standard before ploughing, after ploughing, after sawing) were combined with application of green materials (legumes, grasses) and cultivation of oats as the following crop. Results of these trials should lead to principal solutions in optimization of these cultivation systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kolbe, Hartmut (2007) Tastversuch zur Kompensation negativer Ertragsreaktionen nach Strohdüngung im (viehlosen) Getreideanbau. [Field trial for negative yield effect compensation after straw application in (stockless) cereal production systems.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
